1626130.name: Allura: Curse of the Mermaid
1626130.description:
Help the mermaid Allura to find all clues to solve her mysterious origin in this amazing underwater Match3 adventure!

- An exciting story of romance and adventure, following a young mermaid seeking to discover her past

- Five chapters and twenty upgrades to take you from the familiar world on land to a new world deep under the sea

- Challenging match-3 puzzles as you follow Allura’s story

- A colorful cast of characters to meet as Allura crosses paths with new friends and enemies both above the sea and below

- 20 exciting upgrades
1626130.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
